text: During the successive 3.5-year period, 1229 patients with RTI were included in this study. The median age of the children was 8 months, varying from 1 month to 203 months, of which 63.1% of the patients were under 12 months (41.9% patients â‰¤6 months), 15.6% of the patients were between 1 and 2 years, 15.2% of the patients were between 2 and 5 years, whereas 6.0% of the patients were older than 5 years of age. Among the patients, there were 834 boys and 395 girls, and the sex ratio was 2.1:1. A potential viral pathogen was identified in 652 (53.1%) children (Table 1)
